description: Crispy toasted bread topped with a fresh mix of diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil, drizzled with olive oil. A perfect light appetizer.
Golden, crispy breaded mozzarella sticks served with a tangy marinara dipping sauce. Perfect for sharing or enjoying solo.
Spicy buffalo wings, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, served with a side of ranch dip to cool down the heat.
Baked mushrooms stuffed with a rich mix of cream cheese, garlic, and herbs, providing a delicious and savory bite.
Tender and juicy grilled steak, perfectly seasoned, and served with a side of creamy mashed potatoes and saut√©ed vegetables.
Succulent grilled chicken breast seasoned with herbs, served with roasted vegetables and a light lemon butter sauce.
Classic Italian pasta with a rich and hearty meat sauce, topped with parmesan cheese and served with a side of garlic bread.
Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with a tangy lemon butter sauce, accompanied by steamed vegetables and wild rice.
Classic Coca-Cola served ice cold to refresh your palate.
Freshly squeezed lemonade with just the right balance of sweetness and tartness. Served over ice for ultimate refreshment.
Chilled iced tea brewed to perfection, served with a fresh lemon wedge.
Freshly squeezed orange juice, full of vitamins and flavor, perfect for any meal or as a refreshing drink.
Rich, moist chocolate cake layered with creamy chocolate ganache. A treat for chocolate lovers.
Classic New York-style cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust and a smooth, creamy filling.
Vanilla ice cream served with a rich chocolate sauce or caramel drizzle, perfect for cooling down on a hot day.
Warm, fudgy brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.
Golden, crispy fries seasoned with salt. The perfect side to any main dish or enjoyed on their own.
Crispy battered onion rings fried to perfection, served with a dipping sauce on the side.
Creamy mashed potatoes made with butter and a hint of garlic. A comforting and flavorful side.
Freshly shredded cabbage mixed with a creamy, tangy dressing. The perfect balance of crunch and flavor.
